item.title: ActifSport-Surfwise
item.itunes:author: 29HD Network
item.description: The inspiring and tumultuous story of 85-year old surfer, health advocate and sex guru, Dr. Dorian "Doc" Paskowitz, his wife Juliette, and their nine children who were all home-schooled and raised in a small camper on the beach, where they surfed and had to adhere to the strict diet and lifestyle of animals in the wild.
item.itunes:subtitle: The tumultuous story of 85-year old surfer, Dr. Dorian "Doc" Paskowitz, his wife Juliette, and nine children who were home-schooled and raised in a camper on the beach, where they surfed and adhered to the strict diet and lifestyle of animals in the wild.
item.itunes:summary: The inspiring and tumultuous story of 85-year old surfer, health advocate and sex guru, Dr. Dorian "Doc" Paskowitz, his wife Juliette, and their nine children who were all home-schooled and raised in a small camper on the beach, where they surfed and had to adhere to the strict diet and lifestyle of animals in the wild.
item.itunes:keywords: sports, outdoor, snowboarding, skiing, 29HD Network, 29Guide, World Picture Network, Hauz29, 29World, Moto Guide
